entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 12:09 PM MST Wednesday 3 May 2023
